resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: <span style="color: #333333; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;">Detail of an illuminated oval marker containing the word <em style="color: #333333; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;">sajdah<span style="color: #333333; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;"> instructing the reader to prostrate at this point during the recitation of the Qur’an (<a style="color: #0066ff; text-decoration-line: none; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;" href="http://access.bl.uk/item/viewer/ark:/81055/vdc_100057226629.0x000001?&_ga=2.88979230.403028231.1525281258-286112809.1510772067#?c=0&m=0&s=0&cv=320&xywh=-1%2C-12928%2C5827%2C34135" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">BL Add MS 22412, f. 156r<span style="color: #333333; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13px;">)
resource.chars: Detail of an illuminated oval marker containing the word sajdah instructing the reader to prostrate at this point during the recitation of the Qur’an (BL Add MS 22412, f. 156r)
